mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(DATE '2024-12-01', LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS "yearMonth" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), DATE '2024-12-01') + 1 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(DATE '2024-12-01', LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM') desc

SELECT info_no as "no" , info_sn as "sn" , info_nm as "name" , info_kind as "kind" , info_mnfct as "mnfct" , TO_CHAR(info_buy_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "buy" , TO_CHAR(info_set_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "set" , info_useyn as "useYn" , 'select' AS "rowType" FROM equipment_info
AND TO_CHAR(info_buy_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth}
AND (TO_CHAR(info_buy_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{value} OR info_nm LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%')
ORDER BY info_buy_date DESC
